product_name: Big Agnes Copper Spur UL 4 Tent - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With an ultralight trail weight of only 5 lbs. 5 oz., the updated Big Agnes Copper Spur UL 4 Tent delivers plenty of living space for the whole family to enjoy 3-season adventures in the backcountry. 2 doors and 2 vestibules provide easy access and shared storage areas for up to 4 people; stormflaps protect vestibule zippers. Light yet strong, DAC Featherlite(R) NSL poles are anodized without the use of harmful acids. Double hub/pole design and DAC Twist Clips makes setup quick and easy; DAC H clip attaches tent body to cross pole. Crossover pole provides roominess up high. Lightweight fabric has a high thread count and double twisted thread for strength and durability; opposing mesh doors provide good cross ventilation. Rainfly and floor are made from light, silicone-treated ripstop nylon with a waterproof polyurethane coating; all seams taped with waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape. Interior mesh pockets keep your gear organized and up off the tent floor; includes gear loft loops. Reflective guyline and reflective webbing on tent corners for nighttime visibility. For a lightweight setup during nice weather leave tent body behind; use the rainfly and footprint (not included) with the poles and stakes. The Big Agnes Copper Spur UL 4 Tent includes stuff sacks and 8 superlight aluminum J-stakes. Closeout.
short_description: With an ultralight trail weight of only 5 lbs. 5 oz., the updated Big Agnes Copper Spur UL 4 Tent delivers plenty of living space for the whole family to enjoy 3-season adventures in the backcountry.
